recipe.title: Lemon Anise Slush
ingredients: About 4 cups ice cubes, cracked if large
instructions: Blend juice, sugar, and anise seeds in a blender until seeds are finely ground, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Add vodka or water and enough ice to fill blender, then blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
